attributes.action: British people should not be banned from eating pork to appease Muslims.
attributes.background: Schools, hospitals and care homes are banning the consumption of pork so as not to offend Muslims. This practice is wrong and discriminates against people of other faiths such as Christians and must be stopped. People have a right to eat whatever they wish.

rejection.details: Specific choices about the food served in individual schools, hospitals or care homes are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
